Software Research LLC

  • Software Research LLC
  • info@srllc.org
  • software-research-llc

Software Research LLC has written software for the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services, the U.S. Office of the Director of National Intelligence, the U.S. National Institute of Justice, and the U.K. European Food Safety Authority. We specialize in machine learning, application programming, and custom software solutions.
